title: [K-12] Virtual World-Based Medical Professional Training Program

context.additional_context: A simulation-based learning environment using virtual world platforms (e.g., Second Life), emphasizing real medical scenario replication and collaborative learning.

learning_goals: Enhancing diagnostic and treatment planning skills through a type 2 diabetes patient management simulation in a virtual environment
Cultivate the ability to apply interdisciplinary medical approaches while communicating in real-time with peer learners in a virtual collaborative space
Develop the capacity to critically evaluate the educational utility of virtual reality-based learning tools
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
